io.sarl.core

Interface Lifecycle

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Capacity

    public interface Lifecycle
extends Capacity
    Lifecycle related actions.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void killMe()
      Kills this agent.
      UUID spawnInContext(Class<? extends Agent> agentClass, AgentContext context, Object... params)
      Spawns a new member agent in the parent's context (parentID)

    • Method Detail

      • spawnInContext

        UUID spawnInContext(Class<? extends Agent> agentClass,
                  AgentContext context,
                  Object... params)
        Spawns a new member agent in the parent's context (parentID)

      • killMe

        void killMe()
        Kills this agent. This action must automatically unregister this agent from the default context and therefore all its spaces including the DefaultSpace. If this is a composable agent, it must not have any members before calling this action. Otherwise a RuntimeException will be thrown.
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - when the agent has members
